Properties.ProtectedString:
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Handle:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
Player = nil Character = nil Humanoid = nil
-- Returns a character ancestor and its Humanoid, or nil function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function CastLaser(StartPosition, Direction, MaxDistance, Ignore)
local function RayCast(Pos, Dir, Max, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Pos, Dir.unit * (Max or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
local Hit, EndPosition = RayCast(StartPosition, Direction, MaxDistance, Ignore) local Distance = (StartPosition - EndPosition).magnitude local LaserPart = Instance.new("Part") LaserPart.Name = "CloverLaser" LaserPart.Transparency = 0.000001 LaserPart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom LaserPart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth LaserPart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth LaserPart.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic LaserPart.CanCollide = false LaserPart.Anchored = true LaserPart.Locked = true LaserPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, Distance) local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=149229831" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=149229890" Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(3, 3, (Distance * 25 - (Distance * 2))) Mesh.Parent = LaserPart Debris:AddItem(LaserPart, 1) LaserPart.Parent = Character LaserPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(StartPosition, EndPosition) * CFrame.new(0, 0, (-Distance / 2)) Spawn(function() for i = 1, 20 do wait(0.05) LaserPart.Transparency = LaserPart.Transparency + 0.05 end end)
return Hit, EndPosition, ChosenColor
end
function Fire() if Tool.Enabled and Humanoid.Health > 0 then Tool.Enabled = false
PlaySound.Value = "22968437"
local StartingPosition = Handle.Position + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * (Handle.Size.Z / 2)
local HandleClone = Handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame + HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * ((Handle.Size.Y / 2) - 0.5) local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.Z / 2) - 0.425)
local Hit, Pos = CastLaser(HandleCloneZ.CFrame.p, (Humanoid.TargetPoint - StartingPosition), 100, {Character})
local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit)
if character and character.Parent and humanoid and humanoid.Parent then local Clover = Instance.new("Part") Clover.Name = "CloverLaser" Clover.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Clover.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Clover.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Clover.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic Clover.CanCollide = false Clover.Locked = true Clover.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=149229831" Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=149229890" Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(3, 3, 3) Mesh.Parent = Clover Debris:AddItem(Clover, 10) Clover.Parent = character local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = Hit Weld.Part1 = Clover Weld.Parent = Clover local StickCF = CFrame.new(Pos, Handle.Position) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -1) StickCF = StickCF - CFrame.new(Pos, Handle.Position).lookVector * ((Handle.Size.z / 2) - (Clover.Size.z / 1)) Weld.C1 = StickCF:inverse() * Hit.CFrame local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Value = Player Debris:AddItem(creator_tag, 2) creator_tag.Parent = humanoid humanoid:TakeDamage(10) end
wait(1)
Tool.Enabled = true end end
function OnEquipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not Tool.Enabled then wait(0.5) Tool.Enabled = true end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() Fire() end) end
function OnUnequipped() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Handle:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
PlaySound.Changed:connect(function() if PlaySound.Value ~= "" then local SoundId = PlaySound.Value PlaySound.Value = "" local Sound = Instance.new("Sound") Sound.Looped = false Sound.Pitch = 1 Sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. SoundId Sound.PlayOnRemove = false Sound.Volume = 1 Debris:AddItem(Sound, 3) Sound.Parent = Handle wait() Sound:Play() end end)
